Text: Going to continue to seed this until late summer.
Anyone know how to burn this?

Open your burning program.
Select a regular data DVD
Pick a label, if you want. ANIDVD or something.
Drag all (or at least the VIDEO_TS and AUDIO_TS) folders to the root of the new DVD
Burn it.
Play it.

Your burn program may complain about extra/incorrect files/won't meet the DVD standard. Ignore it. If you can't play this DVD because of the EXTRAS folder, you need a new DVD player.
